name: Roasted Carrots With Garlic
keywords: carrot, coriander, garlic, side dish, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds large carrots (3 to 4 carrots), peeled
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the carrots on an angle about three-fourths of an inch thick. Put the carrots in a baking dish that will hold them snugly in a single layer. Add garlic, oil, salt, pepper, coriander and parsley and toss all ingredients together to mix well.

Rearrange the carrots in a single layer, then put the dish in the oven and roast until the carrots are tender and beginning to brown, which takes about 40 minutes. Turn the carrots once during roasting so they cook evenly. Serve hot or at room temperature.
